GE.answerer: Answered by Valeri Chechelashvili, and has been reviewed by Ani Kintsurashvili

AM.evidence: The Armenian delegation to the forum was headed by Defence Minister Suren Papikyan. He took part in the opening ceremony and plenary session of the forum (2023, Beijing Xiangshan Forum) https://pacsto.org/events/na-syanshanskom-forume-po-bezopasnosti-v-pekine

https://kun.uz/en/news/2022/10/14/communication-and-trust-have-decreased-to-an-unprecedented-level-shavkat-mirziyoyev-delivers-a-speech-at-cica-summit

MX.evidence: There is no observation of the Indicator phenomenon.

PA.evidence: There is no observation of the Indicator phenomenon

CR.evidence: My country’s government has participated in one or more multilateral security dialogues organized by the PRC (e.g. China-Africa Peace and Security Forum; the Conference on Interaction & Confidence Building Measures in Asia). There is no observation of the indicator phenomenon.
CR.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by Team Fundación Andrés Bello - Centro de Investigación Chino Latinoamericano

PE.evidence: According to the Ministry of Defense of Argentina, Peru and other Latin American countries participated in the V Sino-Latin American Defense Forum (a Subforum of the China-CELAC Forum) that took place in December 2022. Therefore, this indicator deserves a “Yes” response.
PE.answerer: Answered by Jack Lo Lau and Jorge Jesús Chávez Ortíz, and has been reviewed by Team Fundación Andrés Bello - Centro de Investigación Chino Latinoamericano

VE.evidence: According to a press release published by the Ministry of Defense of Argentina, a Venezuelan delegation took part of The Fifth Forum China- Latin America and the Carribbean. This event was in december 2022. Therefore, this Indicator deserves a "Yes" response.
VE.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by Team Fundación Andrés Bello - Centro de Investigación Chino Latinoamericano

CL.evidence: This response is only based on available information. Most meetings are in a bilateral capacity, such as the "meeting for defense cooperation between  Chile and China"

SL.evidence: Sierra Leone has participated in the Global Security Initiative. This statement from the attached weblink confirms this: 'The Chinese president welcomed Sierra Leone to participate in the Global Development Initiative, the Global Security Initiative, and the Global Civilization Initiative, and to jointly promote the building of a community with a shared future for humanity.
SL.note: This point from the weblink confirms Sierra Leone's participation in the China-Africa Peace and Security Forum: 'Colonel Stephen Sevalie, commander of the Joint Medical Unit under the Sierra Leone Armed Forces and president of the No. 34 Military Hospital.' This took place in 2021: http://www.81.cn/ChinaMilitary/rdxw_208665/10105675.html
SL.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

PK.evidence: China and Pakistan have ongoing cooperation on security and counter-terrorism. It has been expanded to include Afghanistan and Iran. Pakistan is a member of SCO and backs China's proposed Global Security Initiative (GSI)
PK.answerer: Answered by Shahzeb Jillani, and has been reviewed by Shahzada Zulfiqar

AF.evidence: There is a trilateral dialogue between PRC, Afghanistan, and Pakistan focused on security.
AF.answerer: Answered by Rahimullah Kakar, and has been reviewed by Niva Yau

TM.evidence: Turkmenistan declared its status of permanent neutrality in 1995.
TM.answerer: Answered by Temur Umarov, and has been reviewed by Niva Yau

IN.evidence: There is no observation of the Indicator phenomenon
IN.note: India and China are currently in confrontation over the border since 2020 and as such, we couldn't find any evidence of participation by India in such dialogues organized by PRC, however India participates in groups like BRICS or SCO.
IN.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

NG.evidence: Nigeria has participated in the 2023 China-Africa Peace and Security Forum to cooperate on mutual security interests, but remains committed to upholding African autonomy and preventing undue foreign interference in African affairs. Therefore this indicator deserves a yes response.
NG.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

ZA.evidence: There are no indications that South Africa participated in the the China–Africa Peace and Security Forum, either in 2023 or previously.
ZA.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

SN.evidence: Senegalese Minister of Forces, Me Sidiki and his delegation which included Senegalese ambassador to China, Ibrahima Sory Sylla and senior officers from the army and the National Gendarmerie attended the China-Africa Peace and Security Forum in 2023.
SN.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

ET.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

KE.evidence: Kenya participated in the 3rd China-Africa Security Forum in 2023. Senior Kenya Defence Forces officers were present at the event. Therefore, this Indicator deserves a "Yes" response.
KE.note: The evidence of Kenya's presence at the venue is visible is 00:16 of the video.
KE.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

SG.evidence: Singapore is occasionally invited as a guest to the Conference on Interaction and Confidence-Building Measures in Asia events. It is neither a member nor an observer. Singapore regularly participates at a high level in the Bo'ao Forum.
SG.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

TW.evidence: Taiwan doesn't participate in any of the security dialogues organized by the PRC since PRC is a military hostile country towards Taiwan.
TW.note: China has viewed Taiwan as its breakaway province since KMT lost the civil war and fled to the island in 1949. And it has ramped up military activities in recent months, seeking to assert its sovereignty. The BBC article gives an overall description of the conflict between China and Taiwan.
TW.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

BR.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

PL.evidence: There is no observation of the Indicator phenomenon.
PL.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

VN.evidence: Vietnam is a member state of the Conference on Interaction & Building Measures in Asia, and has participated in the last CICA summit in October 2022. Therefore, this indicator deserves a "Yes" response.
VN.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

NP.evidence: Chief Justice of Nepal attended the the first China (Kashgar)-Central and South Asia Legal Forum being held on the 10th anniversary of the Belt and Road Initiative in 2023. Also, Chief of the Army Staff General Sharma visited Beijing from October 27 to November 2, 2023 to participate in the Beijing-Xiangshan Forum
NP.answerer: Answered by Sriparna Pathak, and has been reviewed by Amish Mulmi

1. Beijing Xiangshan Forum 2021, Minister of Defense Sergey Shoigu
2. World Peace Forum 2022, Igor Ivanov, President of the Russian International Affairs Council

ZW.answerer: Answered by Ernest Mudzengi and 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by Andronicus Sikula and Dr. Obert Hodzi

CD.evidence: Though no officials could have been found. DRC flag picture during the event and information collected confirm that DRC delegation attended the event

AR.evidence: There is no observation of the indicator phenomenon.
AR.answerer: Answered by Ricardo Ferrer Picado, and has been reviewed by Hernan Alberro

UY.evidence: There is no observation of the indicator phenomenon.

SV.evidence: There is no observation of the indicator phenomenon.
SV.answerer: Answered by Eric Lemus, and has been reviewed by Julio Martinez and Alvaro Cruz

PH.evidence: The Philippines actively participates in the ASEAN-China Summit. During the 26th ASEAN-China Summit in Jakarta in September, Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. shared progress in the drafting of the Code of Conduct in the South China Sea. “[S]ome progress were made in discussing the milestone issues and a preliminary review of the Single Draft Negotiating Text,” he said. Therefore, this Indicator deserves a “Yes” response.
PH.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 2 anonymous experts.

TH.evidence: China and Thailand are set to expand their military ties in response to growing Asia-Pacific security challenges. Chinese Defence Minister Li Shangfu announced plans for multiple joint exercises between the two countries this year, including "Assault 2023" and "Peace and Friendship 2023". These exercises aim to strengthen military cooperation and enhance the capabilities of both nations in addressing regional security concerns.
TH.answerer: Answered by Pravit Rojanaphruk, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

MM.evidence: Myanmar regime Defense Minister Admiral Tin Aung San attended the 10th Beijing Xiangshan Forum was jointly held by the Chinese People’s Liberation Army, the China Association of Military Science (CAMS) and the China Institute of International Strategic Studies (CIISS).
MM.answerer: Answered by 2 anonymous experts, and has been reviewed by another 2 anonymous experts.

UG.evidence: Uganda sent officials to the third China-Africa Peace and Security Forum taking place in Beijing. On the sidelines of the forum, State Councilor and Minister of National Defense Li Shangfu met with security and defense leaders from the African Union and 10 African countries, including Uganda.
UG.note: Gen. Muhoozi, President Museveni's son has visited China several times and so have other top UPDF leaders. In 1995, Gen. Muhoozi visited Hunan, Chairman Mao's birth place and in 1995, he joined the army. More here https://www.independent.co.ug/how-china-shapes-ugandas-generals/
UG.answerer: Answered by Abdou Rahim Lema, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

MZ.evidence: Mozambican military personnel attended the 3rd China-Africa Peace and Security Forum in 2023 and have participated in previous editions.
MZ.answerer: Answered by Tomé Bambo, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

AO.evidence: Angola has attended several China-Africa Peace and Security Forums, including the last one in 2023.
AO.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

JP.answerer: Answered by Yuki Moritarni, and has been reviewed by Maiko Ichihara and Ryohei Suzuki

ID.evidence: Indonesia has participated in the Conference on Interaction & Confidence Building Measures in Asia
ID.answerer: Answered by Muhammad Zulfikar Rakhmat, and has been reviewed by Yeta Purnama

KR.evidence: Korea is a member of CICA
KR.answerer: Answered by Muhammad Zulfikar Rakhmat, and has been reviewed by Yeta Purnama

SA.evidence: Saudi Arabia has joined the Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia (CICA) as an Observer State in December 2023.
SA.answerer: Answered by Muhammad Zulfikar Rakhmat, and has been reviewed by Yeta Purnama

QA.evidence: Xi Jinping meets with Qatar's President, Emir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani. Xi Jinping said that China support Qatar in safeguarding national sovereignty, security and stability.
QA.answerer: Answered by Muhammad Zulfikar Rakhmat, and has been reviewed by Yeta Purnama

CA.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by Terry Glavin

KH.evidence: Yes, Cambodia is a member of CICA and participates in CICA conferences.
KH.answerer: Answered by Bradley J. Murg, and has been reviewed by another 2 anonymous experts.

US.evidence: The U.S. defense department sent a delegation to attend China's regional security dialogue, the Xiangshan forum. Therefore, this Indicator deserves a “Yes” response.
US.answerer: Answered by 1 anonymous expert, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

DE.evidence: None of the examples listed, but Germany participated at the Xiangshan Forum.
DE.answerer: Answered by Angela Stanzel, and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.

GB.evidence: No publicly available evidence to support this statement.
GB.answerer: Answered by Leo Shaw, and has been reviewed by Sam Dunning and Andrew Yeh

AU.evidence: While Australia does not participate in multilateral security dialogues organised by the PRC, it does have bilateral defense and security mechanisms, such as the Australia-China Defence Strategic Dialogue, the last edition of which occurred in 2019.
AU.answerer: Answered by Leo Shaw, and has been reviewed by Kevin Mooney and Andrew Yeh

IL.evidence: As of February 2022, Israel is a member of the Conference on Interaction & Confidence Building Measures in Asia (CICA).
IL.answerer: Answered by The Institute for National Security Studies (INSS), and has been reviewed by another 1 anonymous expert.
